titleStmt.title: The repentance of Robert Greene Maister of Artes. Wherein by himselfe is laid open his loose life, with the manner of his death
titleStmt.author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Danter] for Cutbert Burbie, and are to be sold at the middle shop in the Poultry, vnder Saint Mildreds Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
